review: I thought I was buying a device that would wirelessly project onto my TV whatever I see on my laptop but that's not what this device does.  Oh it has the capability but google only allows it to project google friendly content.  For example, I can't use this device to project amazon instant video's onto my TV.  It also forces you to use google chrome which I was open to trying but have found it to be lacking in features that I have come accustom to with firefox.
author: Lew

review: Although it is a great gadget it can be quite difficult to set it up! I bought 2 and one of them was very easy to install. Exactly as mentioned in the instructions. The other one could not find my router... Later I notice that quite some people have the same issue. After some trial-and-error I learned that some settings of the router can prevent communication between the dongle and the network (e.g. WPS on/off). Google had some good FAQ on that matter.Other than that, this is definitely a must-have!
